Parameter Injection

The Dinoloop team created a value injection framework which automatically parses the variable segments from the URI and injects them as action method parameters. This reduces boiler plate code. This is how it works, 


    

    
    
        
  • The variable segment key should match with action method parameter.
    • 
        
  • Currently, all values are injected as a
            string type. This is the limitation of Http segments.
